title: Budgeting Basics Ft. The Budgetnista
description:
In the first ever episode of Money Please, Berna is here to walk us through the basics of budgeting. She’s joined by the The Budgetnista herself, Tiffany Aliche, to talk all about who should budget, how to get started, and offer a few tips and tricks to make the whole ordeal a breeze. Then Berna reads a follower’s email about her wanting to take a more active role in her finances, but feeling overwhelmed by her intimidating student debt. Finally, we close out the show with the Public Forum, brought to you by Public.com, featuring listener-submitted questions all about budgeting. Be sure to follow us @whenshappyhr to send in your questions!
